name: Valtion kehitysyhtiö Vake Oy
goal: Valtion kehitysyhtiö Vake Oy is the Finnish state development company - a forward-looking societal renewer that strives to build a future-proof Finland through active investments and development programmes. The Company promotes pioneering business activities focused on emerging technologies which contribute to the Finnish economy, ownership, skills and jobs as well as wellbeing and security in a globalised economy.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Vake Oy is especially interested in policies related to technology, innovation and artificial intelligence, including the European Commission's AI strategy as well as the coordinated plan on AI. However, the application of new technologies and artificial intelligence covers almost all policy fields.
